title: Senior Software Engineer at Zoom Video Communications
summary: - Associate Senior Software Engineer at Cerner Corporation. - MS in Computer Engineering from Syracuse University. - Graduate Teaching Assistant at Syracuse University for Software Modelling and Analysis and Object Oriented Design course. - Completed an internship in Summer 2016 at Syrasoft LLC where I designed and developed their Storage Management Software as a Web Solution from scratch. - Worked for Amdocs DVCI, Pune, India for 4.8 years as Software Developer. - Experienced in all the phases of SDLC including testing and production support. - Mentored and trained inexperienced employees working on the project. - Have worked for various major telecom service providers like Telstra (Australia), Rogers (Canada), Astro (Malaysia), and AMX (Columbia and Chile). Skills: C, C++, Java, JavaScript, jQuery, JSP, SQL, HTML, XML, CSS, Familiar with C#, Underscore.js, Backbone.js, Require.js, Chart.js, jQuery, NGINX, Grunt. Proficient in using Linux commands and shell scripting, Agile–SCRUM, Mentoring and training freshmen.

experience.title: Graduate Teaching Assistant
experience.description: Graduate Teaching Assistant for SMA (Software Modelling and Analysis) and OOD(Object Oriented Design) course at Syracuse University.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Designed and developed Syrasoft Product website from scratch including technology stack selection, architecture development, and server configuration. Used Backbone.js, Require.js, jQuery as primary technologies and Nginx as Server.

experience.title: Software Developer (Advanced) | AMSS
experience.description: Worked on the deliveries of AMSS (Amdocs Self Service Suite). AMSS facilitates end user to order clients' services from an online portal. It is basically an e-commerce product for telecom service providers. • Designed and built a web portal for Astro (Malaysia) using Amdocs' proprietary UXF (User Experience Framework) based on MVVM architecture and Underscore.js, Backbone.js, and Require.js JavaScript modules. • Developed backend business logic code as RESTful services in Java. • Wrote a Shell script named “Contact Finder” to find all relevant customer records from database for any type of customer possible in the system. • Interacted with clients on site (Kuala Lumpur) while supporting integration with 3rd party systems and Go Live production deployments.

experience.title: Senior Subject Matter Expert | ASMS - OSS
experience.description: - Customized Claro's web portal for their operations in Columbia and Chile using Core Java and J2EE technologies. - Developed code for exposing and consuming 3rd party web services. Deployed in production with zero defects. - Mentored and groomed inexperienced employees working on the project while handling independent modules.

experience.title: Subject Matter Expert | ASMS - OSS
experience.description: Developed and supported requirements of ASMS (Amdocs Service Management Suite) which is a software product built on top of Clarify framework and provides capabilities like Service Order Management and Service Assurance in telecom domain.
